text: Heliophanus furvus is a jumping spider species in the genus Heliophanus that lives in Lesotho. It was first identified in 2014. ==References== Category:Salticidae Category:Spiders of Africa Category:Fauna of Lesotho Category:Spiders described in 2014 Category:Taxa named by Wanda Wesołowska
title: Heliophanus furvus
